subject: Climate & Environment
title: Mangrove Destruction
description: A quick win: understand Mangrove Destruction.

hook.text: Mangroves store four times more carbon per hectare than tropical rainforests. We've lost half of them.

buildup.text: These coastal trees thrive in saltwater, filtering pollution and sheltering fish nurseries.

discovery.text: Mangroves reduce wave energy by up to 66%, protecting coastal communities from storms and flooding.

twist.text: Shrimp farming has destroyed vast mangrove areas in Southeast Asia for cheap seafood exports.

climax.text: Restoring mangroves costs a fraction of building concrete sea walls â€” and works better.

punchline.text: The best coastal defense is a tree that grows in the sea.
